title: Mithril spear

properties.name: description
properties.value: The mithril spear is a two-handed melee weapon made from mithril. Mithril spears are a members-only weapon. It can be bought from the Mount Karuulm Weapon Shop or obtained as a drop from monsters. Using the Smithing skill, players can create mithril spears. However, players must have begun Barbarian Smithing training to be able to smith these spears. Like all spears, the mithril spear can be poisoned.

The mithril spear is a two-handed melee weapon made from mithril. Mithril spears are a members-only weapon. It can be bought from the Mount Karuulm Weapon Shop or obtained as a drop from monsters. Using the Smithing skill, players can create mithril spears. However, players must have begun Barbarian Smithing training to be able to smith these spears. Like all spears, the mithril spear can be poisoned.

UnpoisonedPoisonPoison+
Poison++Karambwan poison

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The spear's attack speed has been decreased from 6 (every 3.6 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).

22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Mithril spear(+)" to "Mithril spear(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Mithril spear(s)" to "Mithril spear(p++)".

The '''mithril spear''' is a [[Two-handed slot table|two-handed]] [[melee]] [[weapon]] made from [[mithril equipment|mithril]]. Mithril spears are a [[members]]-only weapon. It can be bought from the [[Mount Karuulm Weapon Shop]] or obtained as a drop from monsters. Using the [[Smithing]] [[skill]], players can create mithril spears. However, players must have begun [[Barbarian Smithing]] training to be able to smith these spears. Like all spears, the mithril spear can be [[poison]]ed.
